mapper.select: SELECT c.contents_id ,c.user_id ,u.user_name ,c.category_code ,cg.category_name ,c.title ,c.created_date FROM CONTENTS c JOIN CATEGORY cg ON c.CATEGORY_CODE = cg.CATEGORY_CODE JOIN USER u ON c.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE 1=1 AND IS_ENABLE = 'Y'

SELECT c.contents_id ,c.user_id ,u.user_name ,c.category_code ,cg.category_name ,c.title ,c.contents ,c.is_enable ,c.created_date FROM CONTENTS c JOIN CATEGORY cg ON c.CATEGORY_CODE = cg.CATEGORY_CODE JOIN USER u ON c.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE 1=1 AND IS_ENABLE = 'Y' AND CONTENTS_ID = #{contents_id}
SELECT cg.category_code ,cg.category_name FROM CATEGORY cg WHERE 1=1
